text: Hesar (Fence) is a 1983 film by the Iranian director Hassan Mohammadzadeh. It was written by Fazlullah Nuri. It starred Jeyran Sharif and Morteza Najafi. It is set during the Iran-Iraq war and is an early example of Sacred Defence cinema.Soureh Cinema == Cast == ==References== Category:Persian-language films category:Iranian films Category:Iran–Iraq War films Category:Iranian war films Category:1983 films Category:1980s war films
title: Hesar (Iranian film)
